subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: The United States had an impressive all-around showing at the Alpine world ski championships in Beaver Creek, Colo., and international ski officials are talking about holding more events in America.
snippet: The United States had an impressive all-around showing at the Alpine world ski championships in Beaver Creek, Colo., and international ski officials are talking about holding more events in America.
